
//mistake i did
//clarity in logic
//range of inputs
#include <iostream>
#include<unistd.h>
using namespace std;

#define BS 64*1024

char ibuffer[BS];
int ibuffer_offset=0;
int ibuffer_size=0;
char obuffer[BS];
int obuffer_offset=0;

static long inline fastread() {
int r=0, s=1;
while(1) {
if(ibuffer_offset >= ibuffer_size) {
ibuffer_size = read(0, ibuffer, BS);
ibuffer_offset = 0;
}
if(ibuffer[ibuffer_offset] < 48) {
if(s) ibuffer_offset++;
else return r;
}
else {
s = 0;
r = r * 10 + ibuffer[ibuffer_offset++]-48;
}
}
}

void inline flush() {
write(1, obuffer, obuffer_offset);
obuffer_offset = 0;
}

long multi2[32];
long seqsearch(long n) {
	for(int i=0;i<32;i++){
		if(n<multi2[i]){
			return multi2[i-1];
		}
	}
	return 0;
}

int main() {
	std::ios::sync_with_stdio(false);

	multi2[0] = 1;
	int t;
	long n;
	for(int i=1;i<32;i++){
		multi2[i] = multi2[i-1]<<1;
	}
	t=fastread();
	while (t--) {

		 n=fastread();
		cout<<seqsearch(n)<<endl;
	}

	return 0;
}
